channel.title: Festivals – Get to know about Indian Festivals along with most popular festivals celebrated across the world | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Festivals – From Holi, Baisakhi, Navrati, Dussehra, Eid, Diwali to Christmas, read about the most popular festivals celebrated in India and across world. Also get best wishes, festival dates and time, quotes, festival celebration ideas, delicious recipes and gift ideas for each Indian Festival at Hindustan Times

image.title: Festivals – Get to know about Indian Festivals along with most popular festivals celebrated across the world | Hindustan Times

item.title: Happy Slap Day 2023: History, significance, funny messages, quotes and memes to share with your friends or ex you hate
item.description: Slap Day 2023: Anti-Valentine's Week begins with Slap Day. It falls on February 15. Read on to know the history and significance of this day. You can also share funny memes, wishes, messages and greetings with your friends or the ex you hate.

item.title: Masaba Gupta and Satyadeep Misra to Shruti Haasan and Santanu Hazarika: Here's how the lovebirds marked Valentine's Day
item.description: Valentine's Day 2023: Satyadeep Misra and Shruti Haasan celebrated Valentine's Day by penning down loving notes for their partners, Masaba Gupta and Santanu Hazarika. Check their posts inside.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Rajkummar Rao says 'Har baar bas tum hi milna' to Patralekhaa in note: From 2010 to infinity...'
item.description: Rajkummar Rao celebrated Valentine's Day by writing a sweet, romantic note for his wife, Patralekhaa, and asked her, "Har baar bas tum milna." He also shared a collage of their wedding photo and another of when they were in a relationship. See Rajkummar's post inside.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Kareena Kapoor says 'Main apni favourite hoon', Malaika Arora gets her 'Valentine colours on'
item.description: Valentine's Day 2023: Kareena Kapoor and Malaika Arora gave their Valentine's Day celebrations a quirky twist by dropping their fashionable looks. While Kareena, in a sequinned saree, wrote 'Main apni favourite hoon', Malaika got her 'Valentine colours on' in a red jumpsuit.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Google Doodle celebrates February 14 with adorable animation of raindrops joining to form a heart
item.description: Valentine's Day Google Doodle: Valentine's Day falls on February 14 (today). Google Doodle is also celebrating the day of love with an adorable animation which shows raindrops falling to join and form a heart. Read more inside.

item.title: Happy Valentine's Day 2023: Best wishes, images, messages, greetings to share with the love of your life on February 14
item.description: Happy Valentine's Day 2023 Wishes: Valentine's Day annually falls on February 14. Make the love of your life feel extra special on this day by sending them these best wishes, images, romantic messages and greetings on Facebook, WhatsApp and other social media platforms.

item.title: Valentine's Day 2023: Why do we celebrate Valentine's Day on February 14? Know history and significance of day of love
item.description: Happy Valentine's Day 2023: Valentine's Day annually falls on February 14, and people celebrate the day of love with much fervour. Here's all you need to know about the history, significance, why we celebrate the day on February 14, and some interesting facts about the season of Cupid.

item.title: Anti-Valentine's Week 2023 Full List: Slap Day, Kick Day to Breakup Day, find out all about days after Valentine's Week
item.description: Anti-Valentine's Week 2023 Full Calendar: After Valentine's Day (February 14), people celebrate Anti-Valentine's Week from February 15. The days are called Slap Day, Kick Day, Perfume Day, Flirt Day, Confession Day, Missing Day, and Breakup Day. Read about the significance and correct dates inside.
